scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm ci && node --check src/index.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.test: npx concurrently "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:frontend"
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'No lint script in backend'
